  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String fileFolder) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      fileFolder - Folder name where the configuration/level files are.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

  • Method Details

    • setFileFolder

      private void setFileFolder​(java.lang.String fileFolder)
      Setter of the field "fileFolder".
      Parameters:
      fileFolder - Folder name where the configuration/level files are.

    • getFileFolder

      private java.lang.String getFileFolder()
      Getter of the field "fileFolder".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "fileFolder".

    • getBoardSize

      public int getBoardSize()
      Returns the size of the board of the current level.
      Returns:
      The size of the board of the current level.

    • getDifficulty

      public LevelDifficulty getDifficulty()
      Returns the difficulty of the current level.
      Returns:
      The difficulty of the current level.

    • getMinMoves

      public int getMinMoves()
      Returns the minimum number of moves that are needed to solve the current level.
      Returns:
      Minimum number of moves for solving the current level.

    • isFinished

      private boolean isFinished()
      Says if the game is finished (true) or not (false). The game is finished when the field "numLevel" is equals to "MAX_LEVELS".
      Returns:
      True if there are no more levels and thus the game is finished. Otherwise, false.

    • getNumLevel

      public int getNumLevel()
      Getter of the field "numLevel".
      Returns:
      Value of the field "numLevel".

    • nextLevel

      public boolean nextLevel() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Checks if there is a new level, sets numMoves = 0 and loads the level. If the game is finished, it returns false.
      Returns:
      True if there is a next level and it has been loaded.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • loadLevel

      private void loadLevel() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Loads a new level by using the value of numLevel attribute.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.

    • isLevelSolved

      public boolean isLevelSolved()
      Checks if the level is solved, i.e. all bunnies are in a hole.
      Returns:
      true if this level is beaten, otherwise false.

    • getBoardText

      public java.lang.String getBoardText()
      Returns a String with the board of the current level in textual format.
      Returns:
      Text-based board of the current level.

    • move

      public boolean move​(Move move)
      Makes a move given by parameters.
      Parameters:
      move - The object representing the move
      Returns:
      true if the move was successful, false if parameters are invalid or the move was unsuccessful (e.g. there was an exception).

    • getPieces

      public java.util.List<Piece> getPieces()
      Returns the board of the current level as an 1-D list.
      Returns:
      1-D list of Pieces

    • setNumMoves

      private void setNumMoves​(int numMoves)
      Setter of the numMoves attribute.
      Parameters:
      numMoves - New value of the numMoves attribute.

    • incNumMoves

      private void incNumMoves​(Move move, boolean isBunny)
      Adds/Increases the attribute numMoves according to the distance between the ending and starting coordinates of move as long as the move is valid.
      Parameters:
      move - Move object that contains the move that is done.
      isBunny - Indicates if the move is done by a bunny (true) or a fox (false). If the move is done by a bunny, the increment is always 1.

    • getNumMoves

      public int getNumMoves()
      Getter of numMoves attribute.
      Returns:
      The value of numMoves attribute.

    • reload

      public void reload() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException
      Reload the current level, i.e. assigns 0 to numMoves and load the level again.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file.
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
